特記事項: 【合併】Intercultural Communication（総合政策学部）/異文化間コミュニケーション論（総合政策学部）
授業方法:
This course will be taught face-to-face. Every content lecture will be based on an academic English reading (usually 8 - 15 pages) and consist of an in-person lecture supported by PowerPoint slides and student notetaking. Three lessons will be designated for Unit Tests, and the final lesson will be designated for course review and completion of the Reflective Writing Assignment.

All course reading and handout materials will be distributed to students via the course LUNA site. Students are expected to access and use electronic course materials on their own. No printed materials will be provided.
